FuncDef:
The next sid label command sets a next-hop label on an explicit path to be established using labels configured in sequence.
The undo next sid label command deletes a specified next-hop label from an explicit path.
By default, no next-hop label is specified on an explicit path.
CLIs: next sid label <label-value> type { adjacency | prefix | binding-sid }
undo next sid label <label-value> [ type { adjacency | prefix | binding-sid } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a label value.
The value is an integer ranging from 16 to 1048575.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set a next-hop label on an explicit path to be established using labels configured in sequence, run the next sid label command.
Prerequisites
MPLS TE has been enabled using the mpls te command in the MPLS view.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the display explicit-path command to view information about the explicit path.
